document.full_text: jamal crawford scored 25 points for host atlanta, and joe johnson made four big free throws in the final 20 seconds to preserve an 88-85 victory.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: hawks thwart magic for a 3-1 series lead
lines_and_colors: jamal crawford scored 25 points for host atlanta, and joe johnson made four big free throws in the final 20 seconds to preserve an 88-85 victory.
